replies.body: Make an Arcade {{champion:90}} for the fact that his recall animation can be him playing Dance Dance Revolution (DDR) With his Voidling, his voidling can be made 8Bit, all of his abilities and passive can be colored coded like a rainbow, and best of all his Ult will look like he's barfing rainbows into theirs faces. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}  Also I forgot to add that he should have a taunt where when he takes off his hood he should say "Game Over" and when he puts his hood on he should say "Game ON". :)
We need this like {{champion:104}} needs his cigar
how about we give him a vape? Also Riot did confirm that he dose promote vapenation. Something to think about
I'm pretty sure was that That one rioter literally said quote and quote "Graves Vapes Now"
i want to see that happen sooo bad
Logged in just to upvote this. Hopefully it'll be a dream come true in the near future.
Also I forgot to add that he should have a taunt where when he takes off his hood he should say "Game Over" and when he puts his hood on he should say "Game ON". :)

Oh my gosh yes!!! This is genius!!! 
Everyone upvote this to get Riot to make it happen

Nothing against the art or artists, but I personally feel that the bad guys/bosses need more attention. Everything seems to be about the human/human-like characters, especially intentionally sexy female champs like Ahri who always seem to grab the spotlight. Just saying.

It's artists lol, what'd you expect? I mean the human body(Female specifically imo)  in it self is very artistic and very profitable and pleasing to look at, and Ahri was the most recent big one everyone's been guessing would be coming out for a long time, so of course she's the one there gonna draw, Like long long time, there has been speculation that Arcade ahri was in the works since as long as a year or two ago. Not to mention you can't go wrong with Ahri lol
only one corki drawing, wow
So this is why Riot keeps making more {{champion:103}} skins.  They need new fap material.
:3 Arcade Ahri is so damn cute!
